page.title: 20MADELEY STAFFS : CREDITS
page.content:
Each week a mobile library van from Stafford visits the Village Hall on 2 days.Another from Newcastle visits Madeley Heath.These are contact points for other resources at base.Fiction & reference works are available.Helped by such information sources,neighbours & friends,the members of Madeley WI listed below have conducted this survey Transference to computer was possible through the courtesy of Mr.J.Wood,Head of Madeley High School. ********************************** J.MANLEY E.WALKLETT S&M.DAVIES B.POUND M.CLARK J.COOKE J.ADAMSON S.WRIGHT C.LAMBERT J.KIMBER C.MORGAN M.LILLEY A&M.LOCKETT V.WOOLLISCROFT B.SHARPE R.LOBBAN D.WIVALL S.TWIGG GENERAL EDITOR.. J.MANLEY
COMPUTER OPERATOR J.WALKLETT. {a pupil of Madeley High School}
